formatDescription: TAG is the native, XML-based format of Transcriber AG, a tool for assisting the manual annotation of speech signals. Transcriber AG (https://transag.sourceforge.net/) superseded a previous tool, Transcriber (https://trans.sourceforge.net/)

internalSignatures.name: Transcriber AG TAG Format
internalSignatures.note: BOF offset 0, XML 1.0 declaration, then !DOCTYPE declaration ‘AGSet’. A DTD for version 3.0 of the file format can be found here: https://github.com/giuliopaci/transcriber-ag/blob/master/source/etc/TransAG/TransAG-3.0.dtd. For now, PRONOM does not distinguish between different versions of TAG
